or Rahimyar Khan (Urdu: رحیم یار خان) is a city in the

. Rahi Yar Khan city is one of the few cities in the world that are still at their pioneering stage since the formation of cities like London and Damascus. It has been renamed customarily amid last 5000 years, first available (on record) name was AROR or ALOR, and then it became City of Pattan, Phul Wada, Noshehra and now Rahi Yar Khan.

Rahim Yar Khan is one of the modern district headquarter cities in Punjab. Although the city seems a far off place to those living in Lahore, Karachi or Islamabad, but the city has very good civic facilities. It is connected with rest of Pakistan by air, rail and road and all types of telecommunication links are available. The city has good educational facilities in public and private sector and Sheikh Zayed Medical College is the latest addition to these.
Urdu Local Newspaper: Daily Express, Rahim Yar Khan Uptodate
If you want to be here by train then Rahim Yar Khan is connected to all Pakistan by railway line so you may not have any kind of problem in this case
If you want to come by road you have so many options but we do prefer "President Line" or "Daewoo Express"

value: content=gives us a very wide range of shoes in a very reasonable price. They know the art of sales-man-ship so one can get shoes up to his/her satisfaction level.
content=one of the famous brands for ladies’ and kids’ wear. It has a huge collection of un-stitched material especially for brides.

content=Has a good collection for groom wear and for those who wanna buy something special for their husband or fiancé. Neran’g ( women un-stitched wear) is also very famous. Price are quite reasonable as far as cloths are concerned but ladies hand bags are quite expensive but Unique without any doubt.
content=is a brand having ladies and kids wear in very reasonable and affordable prices by far. One can find very good stuff and material in stitched and un-stitched cloths.
content=shop in Rahim yar khan has good variety of accessories rather than that of cloths or shoes. Yup ultra modern personas can get there type of Stuff.

As far as the restaurants are concern Rahim Yar Khan  does not disappoint taste conscious people cuz it has some top class food places

Liquor is available however no formal liquor-shop in the town.

Lussi or Lussie; a drink made by beaten yogurt and milk, can arguably be called a local drink. After shaking the milk and yogurt to an extent when butter is topped, the rest of the liquid is called a form of Lussi, it can be consumed sweet or sour with the salt.

Another local drink is called Satoo; made of roasted ground barley with sugar; it is also believed the best drink to counter the heat of the long summer of the region.

Rahim Yar Khan and its suburbs are also believed to be the best mango producing region in the world so the juices of the fruit. Falsa (blackberry) juice is also a popular drink.
